EmailTemplate.subject: Welcome to Copado Partner Portal: Verify your email address!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Target_User.FirstName},
We need to verify your email address before you can start accessing Copado Community as a Partner.
Verify your email address by clicking {!$Label.Copado_Community_URL}s/partnerverification?uid={! Target_User.Partner_Unique_Id__c}.
Thanks! Copado Community
